div.p: SHOWING THAT WASN’T AIRED. FOR EXAMPLE, ON KEYSTONE, I
THINK HE KIND OF ESCAPED ON THAT BECAUSE HE SAID -- YOU
SAID I ASSUME YOU ARE GOING TO PROVE IT AND HE GAVE YOU
THE STUFF ABOUT WELL IT’S GOT TO BE STUDIED WE HAVE
GOT TO GET MORE INPUT FROM THE OTHER DEPARTMENTS AND WE
HAVE GOT TO HEART FROM SECRETARY KERRY.
AND YOU MIGHT HAVE SAID LOOK THERE ARE A LOT OF THINGS
THAT MIGHT HAVE BEEN SAID. YOU MIGHT HAVE SAID LOOK,
YOU BE THE ONE WHO MAKES THE DECISION.
>> HE IS GOING TO APPROVE THE PIPELINE I WILL TELL YOU
NOW. >> I DON’T KNOW THAT HE WILL
APPROVE THE PIPELINE. >> HE WILL.
>> ALL I KNOW HE HAS WAITED FIVE AND A HALF YEARS TO THE
POINT WHERE THE CANADIAN FOREIGN MINISTER HAD TO COME
TO WASHINGTON AND WHAT FOR A CANADIAN WAS AN EXPLOSION OF
RAGE POLITELY SAID YOU CAN’T KEEP US ON THE HOOK FOREVER
THIS THING HAS BEEN STUDIED FOR FIVE AND A HALF YEARS.
LONGER THAN THE SECOND WORLD WAR AND HE IS STILL HOLDING
OUT. >> I THINK HE IS GOING TO
APPROVE IT BEFORE THE ELECTION IN NOVEMBER TO TRY
TO GIVE THE DEMOCRATS SOME COVER.
I WOULD BE SURPRISED IF HE DOESN’T.
NOW, THE USUAL AND BY THE WAY THE "THE WASHINGTON
POST" DID NOT RUN THE REVIEW IN ITS NEWSPAPER JUST ON THE
INTERNET WHICH WAS INTERESTING.
WE HAVE GOLDBERG COMING UP WITH THAT THE FAR RIGHT AND
FAR LEFT HATED THE INTERVIEW.
THEY ARE ALWAYS GOING TO HATE IT THEY WANT YOU TO
HURT THEM OR GIVE THEM A PASS AND LET THEM TALK FOR
10 OR 20 MINUTES STRAIGHT BUT I BELIEVE THAT -- HERE
IS WHAT I TOOK AWAY AND SEE IF YOU CONCUR.
I DON’T THINK THAT THE PRESIDENT THINKS THAT MY
QUESTIONS ABOUT THE IRS, BENGHAZI, AND THE ROLLOUT OF
OBAMACARE ARE IMPORTANT. HE DOESN’T THINK THEY ARE
BORN. YOU KNOW, IN HIS OWN MIND,
IN HIS ADMINISTRATION HE FEELS THAT HE IS DOING
WHAT’S RIGHT FOR THE COUNTRY.
ULTIMATELY HE WILL BE PROVEN CORRECT.
THESE ARE LITTLE ANNOYANCES, THAT’S WHY HE DOESN’T EVEN
ANSWER AND THEN HE ATTACKS FOX NEWS FOR ASKING.
>> YOU KNOW, I’M NOT EVEN SURE ANYMORE.
BECAUSE IF HE THINKS IT’S UNIMPORTANT, THEN IS HE
DELUSIONAL AND I THINK HE IS NOT A DELUSIONAL MAN.
I THINK HE IS ALSO VERY SMART.
I THINK HE LARGELY PRETENDS THAT THESE ARE DISTRACTIONS,
THAT THESE ARE STUFF INVENTED BY FOX AS A WAY TO
DEFLECT THEM. LOOK, BENGHAZI IS A DISASTER
AND IT REALLY SITS AT HIS DOOR AND SECRETARY CLINTON’S
DOOR AND HE KNOWS THAT. AND WHEN HE TELLS YOU THAT
THEY WERE STRAIGHT WITH THIS, THIS IS SIMPLY NOT
TRUE. YOU KNOW THE FACT THAT A
WEEK AFTER IT HAPPENED HE IS ON THE VIEW AND HE PRETENDS
THAT THEY ARE STILL LOOKING INTO THIS TO SEE WHETHER IT
WAS AN CONTROLLED SITUATION IS SIMPLY SHOCKING.
>> YOU BELIEVE PANETTA TOLD THEM WHAT GENERAL HAM TOLD
THEM? DO YOU BELIEVE THAT?
TELL THE FOLKS WHY YOU BELIEF THAT PANETTA.
>> THE GENERAL IN CHARGE, GENERAL HAM HAS SAID
PUBLICLY THAT HE KNEW WITHIN 15 MINUTES.
15 MINUTES HE KNEW IT WAS A TERRORIST ATTACK.
OUR GUY IN TRIPOLI SAID HE KNEW IMMEDIATELY IT WAS A
ATTACK. SECURITY AT THE BENGHAZI
CONSULATE KNEW IMMEDIATELY. OBAMA SAID TO YOU IN THE
INTERVIEW IT WASN’T WELL ORGANIZED.
IN THE BIPARTISAN REPORT FROM THE SENATE DEMOCRATS
AND REPUBLICANS THEY SAY IN THAT REPORT IT WAS ORGANIZED
>> EXACTLY. LET ME ASK YOU ONE MORE
QUESTION BECAUSE I’M RUNNING OUT OF TIME HERE.
DO YOU BELIEVE WHEN I TOLD THE PRESIDENT THAT HE AND
HIS ACOLYTES DIDN’T SAY RIGHT AWAY IT WAS A
TERRORIST ATTACK WAS BECAUSE OF THE ELECTION.
>> OF COURSE. THERE WAS NO OTHER REASON.
WHY WOULD YOU SEND OUT THE U.N. AMBASSADOR WITH A TALE
THAT WAS PREPOSTEROUS FROM THE BEGINNING.
REMEMBER OUR GUY IN TRIPOLI, HIX, HE SAID THAT WHEN HE
WATCHED THE INTERVIEW HIS JAW DROPPED BECAUSE HE KNEW
IT WASN’T TRUE AND HE KNEW THAT EVERYONE KNEW IT WASN’T
TRUE. WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT IF YOU
WERE NOT TRYING TO COVER. IF IT WAS COVER UP WHY
DIDN’T IT COME OUT. >> CAME OUT SLOWLY.
HE GOT THROUGH THE ELECTION WITHOUT THIS BECOMING A BIG
ISSUE. THAT’S ALL THEY CARED ABOUT
WAS TO GET THROUGH THE ELECTION.
>> WAS IT A BORING INTERVIEW, RIGHT?
>> IT WAS BETTER THAN THE GAME BY FAR.
AND THE SCORE WAS CLOSER IN THE INTERVIEW THAN IT WAS IN
THE GAME. >> DON’T FORGET TO CHECK OUT
CHARLES’ BIG BEST SELLER "THINGS THAT MATTER."
BERNIE GOLDBERG TAKES A LOOK AT THE REACTION TO MY
INTERVIEW WITH THE PRESIDENT.
